Field.note: Duration over which the controller should measure decreasing windspeed to identify eyewall passage

Field.name: Wind Trend Fraction
Field.note: Percentage of decreasing windpseed measurements over the wind trend length to identify eyewall passage

Field.name: Intercept Offset
Field.note: Offset in degrees from the wind direction the controller uses while intercepting the eyewall

Field.name: Time for Turn
Field.note: Time in seconds that wind measurements should be ignored after a turn to allow aircraft to stabilize.
